content.raw: This code is fairly well tested in out lab for a year and a half. I'm currently working to make this a bit more general by adding the ability to move the markers with the mouse. This will allow to individually choose the size of the time slots. I'm not sure when this more general non linear time is finished so that will be a new pull request at a later time.
